title: League Crashing
body: My league has crashed twice in my last 5 games. The first time not opening upon the start of the game, and the second time completely shutting down my computer, and somehow this disconnect during champion select lead to a game starting up and this lead to me getting game restarts twice. It is not fair that I am being punished for this bug, and if somehow this is related to my hardware it does not make sense as i have used this laptop to play League of Legends for 2 years and it has not crashed prior to this.

replies.body: Can you give me a few more details as to what happened during these incidents? Any error messages or specific behavior you saw just before your PC shutdown?
